data.text: @PonJosephine I certainly hope that normal does not mean increased Covid cases in hospitals....
@PonJosephine Are conservatives in Alberta truly that blind to Jason Kenny’s “Bullshit “ if the UCP have a hope to survive you need to get rid of Jason Kenny !!!!!

@PonJosephine The dictatorship of Jason Kenny , Kenny is and has always been against protecting Albertans, he refers to protective measures as damaging restrictions…. It’s as plain as day Jason Kenny is only thinking about those against protective measures… Hell no Jason Kenny must go
